answers.answer: They moved it up just one day?

Yeah, they measure your baby and that isn't 100% accurate. Each month i get different due dates from 1 day to even a week earlier. My gyneacologist said they use the first given date as the official due date tho. As long the date isn't to far of from the original one, al it means is that your baby is on schedule with growth etcI'm pretty sure too about when my baby was conceived, and that means my first due date is quite accurate.
Yeah she said that according to the measurements that I was only off by one day. I knew when I had my last period so we will find out soon enough. Lol. Just over half way there.
I was a week further along than I should of been bc obviously i ovulated a week early???   Even tho my period was on point the month before I found out I was prego.
My original due date was Aug 7th, then Aug 22nd, then Aug 14th now it's back to Aug 7th

question: I am having a boy and my due date changed from being due on August 13th to Aug 12th. I find that strange because I had a normal period from whag I remember anyway. So I feel like I am being paranoid. I don't want to get Gestational Diabetes or anything. Lol. Anyone else had the same situation?
title: Having a boy!
